mapper.insert: INSERT member (memId, memPwd, memNickname, memBirth, memHp, memZipcode, memAddress1, memAddress2, memGenre) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memNickname}, #{memBirth}, #{memHp}, #{memZipcode}, #{memAddress1}, #{memAddress2}, #{memGenre})
mapper.select: SELECT memId FROM member WHERE memId=#{memId} and memPwd=#{memPwd}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member WHERE memId = #{memId} AND memPwd = #{memPwd}
